518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PARID
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Parcel Identification Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A 16 character unique identifier for the parcel.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYHOUSENUM
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: House Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: House Number for the  physical location of property; may be zero or blank.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYFRACTION
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: House Number Fraction
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Continued House Number information for the  physical location of property; such as 1/2, the house number ending range, or a letter.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYADDRESS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Street
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Street name for the  physical location of the property, including directional indicators and suffixes.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYCITY
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: City
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: City where the property is physically located.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYSTATE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: State
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: State where the property is physically located.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYUNIT
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Unit Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Unit numbers for the property, such as condo units (e.g. 1, 3C,  115A, B13, etcï¿½.).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PROPERTYZIP
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Zip code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Zip Code where the property is physically located.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: MUNICODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Municipality Code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Municipality number associated with specified parcel.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: MUNIDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Municipality Name
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Municipality name associated with specified parcel.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SCHOOLCODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: School District Code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: School district number associated with specified parcel.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SCHOOLDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: School District Name
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: School district name associated with specified parcel.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LEGAL1
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Legal Description 1
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Line 1 of parcel legal description from the Deed.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LEGAL2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Legal Description 2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Line 2 continuation of parcel legal description from the Deed.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LEGAL3
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Legal Description 3
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Line 3 continuation of parcel legal description from the Deed.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: NEIGHCODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Neighborhood Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The ID number for the valuation neighborhood containing this parcel.   Valuation neighborhoods were delineated as part of the 2013 reassessment.  A valuation neighborhood is a geographic area exhibiting a high degree of homogeneity in economic amenities, land use, economic trends, and property characteristics such as quality, age, and condition.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: NEIGHDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Neighborhood Name
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The name associated with the valuation neighborhood number, if a name exists.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TAXCODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Tax Status
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Tax Status indicates whether or not real estate taxes apply to a parcel's assessment.   Parcels may be Taxable (must pay local taxes), Exempt (pay no taxes), or PURTA [Public Utility Realty Tax Act (if taxes are paid, they are paid into a state fund rather than to local taxing bodies)]. Values:  'E' , 'T' or 'P' .

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TAXDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Tax Status Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description for Tax Status codes:  '10 - Exempt', '20 - Taxable' or '12 - Public Utility Realty Tax - PURTA'.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TAXSUBCODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Tax Sub Code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Tax Sub Code applies only to parcels having the PURTA tax status.  Public Utilities may not have to pay taxes (E-Exempt) or they may have to pay taxes into a state fund (T-Taxable).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TAXSUBCODE_DESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Tax Sub Code Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Values:  E - 'PURTA - Exempt',  T - 'PURTA -Taxable' or null.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: OWNERCODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Owner Type Code 1
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Numeric code categorizes owner as individuals ('REGULAR' ) vs corporations ('CORPORATION').

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: OWNERDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Owner Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Descriptions for numeric owner codes.  [e.g. individuals ('REGULAR' ) vs corporations ('CORPORATION')]

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CLASS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Class
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Broad self-explanatory categories for describing the  general use of a parcel. Categories:  R - RESIDENTIAL, U - UTILITIES, I - INDUSTRIAL, C - COMMERCIAL, O - OTHER, G - GOVERNMENT, F - AGRICULTURAL.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CLASSDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Class Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Broad self-explanatory categories for describing the  general use of a parcel. Categories:  R - RESIDENTIAL, U - UTILITIES, I - INDUSTRIAL, C - COMMERCIAL, O - OTHER, G - GOVERNMENT, F - AGRICULTURAL.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: USECODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Land Use Code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: More detailed than class, these categories further describe the primary use of the parcel.  There are about 200 self-explanatory categories.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: USEDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Land Use Code Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: More detailed than class, these categories further describe the primary use of the parcel.  There are about 200 self-explanatory categories.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LOTAREA
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Sum of Area of Land
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Total square footage of land.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: HOMESTEADFLAG
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Homestead Flag
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A property owner may apply for a homestead reduction on their primary residence.  If granted (indicated by 'HOM') the owner will receive a standard reduction on their assessment for County taxes under Act 50.  They may also receive a variable reduction on their School taxes under Act 1.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CLEANGREEN
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Clean and Green Flag
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: This field indicates that a parcel is receiving a reduction in their assessment due to the stateï¿½s Clean and Green preferential assessment program.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FARMSTEADFLAG
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Farmstead Flag
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A property owner may apply for a farmstead reduction if their primary residence is a farm with at least 10 contiguous acres.  If granted (indicated by 'FRM') the owner will receive a standard reduction on their assessment for County taxes under Act 50.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: ABATEMENTFLAG
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Abatement Flag
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: This field indicates that a parcel is receiving a reduction in their County assessment due to a County-approved incentive program.   Specific programs and amounts vary according to the County resolutions and ordinances in effect at the time.  Consult the Office of Property Assessments web page to see the current types of Abatements.  Abatements have been available to residential property owners as incentives for new construction and for building improvements.  Abatements for commercial properties have been available for local economic revitalization programs.  Values:  'Y' or null.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: RECORDDATE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Record Date
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Date the sale was recorded in the Department of Real Estate (mm/dd/yyyy).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SALEDATE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Sale Date
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Date the sale occurred  (mm/dd/yyyy).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SALEPRICE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Sale Price
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Amount paid for the sale (also called the consideration).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SALECODE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Sale Validity Code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A subjective categorization (code) as to whether or not the sale price was representative of current market value. These categorizations are subject to change as sales are reviewed by the Office of Property Assessments or during a reassessment. See further details in the Sale Validation Codes Details tab of the "Property Sale Transaction Data Dictionary".

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: SALEDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Sale Validity Code Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A subjective categorization (description) as to whether or not the sale price was representative of current market value. These categorizations are subject to change as sales are reviewed by the Office of Property Assessments or during a reassessment. See further details in the Sale Validation Codes Details tab of the "Property Sale Transaction Data Dictionary".

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: DEEDBOOK
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Book Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Cross-reference to the physical book number where the deed is on file in the Department of Real Estate.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: DEEDPAGE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Page Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Page within the specified deed book corresponding to the first page of this physical deed.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PREVSALEDATE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Previous Sale Date
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Date the previous sale occurred  (mm/dd/yyyy).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PREVSALEPRICE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Previous Sale Price
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Amount paid for the previous sale.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PREVSALEDATE2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Previous Sale Date 2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Date the 2nd previous sale occurred  (mm/dd/yyyy).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: PREVSALEPRICE2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Previous Sale Price 2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Amount paid for the 2nd previous sale.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS1
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Change Notice Full Address 1
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Address of owner of the property.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Change Notice Full Address 2
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Address of owner of the property.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS3
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Change Notice Full Address 3
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Address of owner of the property.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS4
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Change Notice Full Address 4
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Address of owner of the property.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: COUNTYBUILDING
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: County Assessed Value for Building
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value of the building for county tax purposes.   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after any preferential assessments (such as clean & green) or county reductions (such as homesteads or other abatements) have been deducted from the base year market values.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: COUNTYLAND
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: County Assessed Value for Land
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value of the land for county tax purposes.   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after any preferential assessments (such as clean & green) or county reductions (such as homesteads or other abatements) have been deducted from the base year market values.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: COUNTYTOTAL
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: County Assessed Value Total
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value (land and building together) for county tax purposes.   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after any preferential assessments (such as clean & green) or county reductions (such as homesteads or other abatements) have been deducted from the base year market values.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: COUNTYEXEMPTBLDG
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: County Exempt Building Amount
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The amount of assessment reduction granted on a building by the County (for county taxes only) under incentive programs for new construction, building improvements or local economic revitalization.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LOCALBUILDING
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Local  Assessed Value for Building
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value of the building for local tax purposes (for schools and municipalities).   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after preferential assessments (such as clean & green) have been deducted from the base year market values.   This value is often higher than the county assessed value since county-only incentives (such as homesteads) have not been deducted.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LOCALLAND
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Local Assessed Value for Land
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value of the land for local tax purposes (for schools and municipalities).   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after preferential assessments (such as clean & green) have been deducted from the base year market values.   This value is often higher than the county assessed value since county-only incentives (such as homesteads) have not been deducted.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: LOCALTOTAL
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Local Assessed Value Total
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The assessed property value (land and building together) for local tax purposes (for schools and municipalities).   This amount reflects the remaining assessment after preferential assessments (such as clean & green) have been deducted from the base year market values.   This value is often higher than the county assessed value since county-only incentives (such as homesteads) have not been deducted.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FAIRMARKETBUILDING
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Fair Market Building Value
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The base year appraised fair market value of the building.  This value has had no reductions, not even Clean and Green preferential assessment reduction.  Allegheny County currently uses a base year of 2012.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FAIRMARKETLAND
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Fair Market Land Value
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The base year appraised fair market value of the land.  This value has had no reductions, not even Clean and Green preferential assessment reduction.  Allegheny County currently uses a base year of 2012.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FAIRMARKETTOTAL
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Fair Market Total Value
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The base year appraised fair market value of land and building together.  This value has had no reductions, not even Clean and Green preferential assessment reduction.  Allegheny County currently uses a base year of 2012.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: STYLE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Architectural Style
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The building style.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: STYLEDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Architectural Style Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description for building style.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: STORIES
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Number of Stories
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Refers to the story height of the main dwelling.  Attics are not included.  A fractional story height (e.g. 1.5) denotes an upper story where part of the living space is less than full height due to a sloped roof or dormers.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: YEARBLT
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Year Built
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The original date of construction.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: EXTERIORFINISH
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Exterior Wall code
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The exterior wall type.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: EXTFINISH_DESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Exterior Wall Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description of building material used for exterior walls.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: ROOF
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Roof
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The roofing material type.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: ROOFDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Roof Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description of roofing material.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: BASEMENT
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Basement
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: This code describes the basement under the main part of the dwelling, and categorizes its size in relation to the main dwelling. 1. NONE  - there is no basement. 2. SLAB/PIERS -indicates slab or pier construction. 3. CRAWL - indicates crawl space to 1/4 basement area. 4. PART - indicates basement is between 1/4 and 3/4 of the main dwelling area. 5. FULL - indicates 3/4 to full basement area.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: BASEMENTDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Basement Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description of basement type, if one exists.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: GRADE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Grade
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Grade refers to quality of construction:  A, X, XX  - have superior materials and workmanship and are typically custom designed or historic homes. B - construction has above average construction and may exceed code. C - is the standard, construction meets code, and is typical of current materials and methods. D - construction is adequate, but below average with minimal features. E - construction lacks some basics and may be a "camp" or seasonal structure.  Pluses and minuses may be used.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: GRADEDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Grade Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Grade refers to quality of construction:  A, X, XX  - Very Good and Excellent - have superior materials and workmanship and are typically custom designed or historic homes. B - Good - construction has above average construction and may exceed code. C - Average - is the standard, construction meets code, and is typical of current materials and methods. D - Below Average - construction is adequate, but below average with minimal features. E - Poor - construction lacks some basics and may be a "camp" or seasonal structure.  Pluses and minuses may be used.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CONDITION
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Condition
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Code for the overall physical condition or state of repair of a structure, relative to its age. Indicated by number and description:  1- Excellent - outstanding maintenance. 7- Very good - high degree of upkeep. 2- Good - above ordinary maintenance. 3- Average - ordinary maintenance, shows normal wear and tear. 4- Fair - sound but with noticeable deferred maintenance. 5- Poor - structural deterioration caused by significant and chronic deferred maintenance. 8- Very poor - barely livable. 6- Unsound - not suitable for habitation.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CONDITIONDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Condition Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description for the overall physical condition or state of repair of a structure, relative to its age. Indicated by number and description:  1- Excellent - outstanding maintenance. 7- Very good - high degree of upkeep. 2- Good - above ordinary maintenance. 3- Average - ordinary maintenance, shows normal wear and tear. 4- Fair - sound but with noticeable deferred maintenance. 5- Poor - structural deterioration caused by significant and chronic deferred maintenance. 8- Very poor - barely livable. 6- Unsound - not suitable for habitation.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CDU
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: CDU
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: CDU is a composite rating for structures measuring: Condition (physical condition relative to age), Desirability (location, style), and Utility (functional obsolescence of layout or design). Proper neighborhood delineation compensates for most Desirability and Utility issues, leaving Physical Condition the most influential factor in CDU.  CDU will be null for vacant land.  Excellent - Perfect condition, very attractive and highly desirable. Very good - Slight deterioration, but still quite attractive and desirable. Good - Minor visible deterioration, slightly less attractive and desirable, but still useful. Average - Normal wear and tear, average utility and desirability. Fair - Usable but marked deterioration.  Somewhat unattractive and undesirable. Poor - Obvious deterioration, definitely undesirable. Very poor - Extremely undesirable and barely usable. Unsound - Unfit for use.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CDUDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: CDU Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: CDU is a composite rating for structures measuring: Condition (physical condition relative to age), Desirability (location, style), and Utility (functional obsolescence of layout or design). Proper neighborhood delineation compensates for most Desirability and Utility issues, leaving Physical Condition the most influential factor in CDU.  CDU will be null for vacant land.  Excellent - Perfect condition, very attractive and highly desirable. Very good - Slight deterioration, but still quite attractive and desirable. Good - Minor visible deterioration, slightly less attractive and desirable, but still useful. Average - Normal wear and tear, average utility and desirability. Fair - Usable but marked deterioration.  Somewhat unattractive and undesirable. Poor - Obvious deterioration, definitely undesirable. Very poor - Extremely undesirable and barely usable. Unsound - Unfit for use.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TOTALROOMS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Total Rooms
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Total number of rooms in the main dwelling.ï¿½ This includes Rec-rooms and FBLA (Finished Basement Living Area).ï¿½ This count is for descriptive purposes only and does not affect assessed value.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: BEDROOMS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Bedrooms
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The total number of separate rooms designed to be used as bedrooms.  If a room was designed to be a bedroom, but is being utilized for some other purpose - such as a den, it is to be included in this count.  This is for descriptive purposes only and does not affect value.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FULLBATHS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Full Baths
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A full bath has a toilet, sink and bathing facility (shower or tub).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: HALFBATHS
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Half Baths
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: A half bath has a toilet and sink only.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: HEATINGCOOLING
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Heating Cooling
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Code for the type of Heating / Cooling system.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: HEATINGCOOLINGDESC
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Heating Cooling Description
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Description for the type Heating / Cooling system.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FIREPLACES
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Number of Wood burning Fireplaces Stacks
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The number of wood-burning fireplace chimneys/vents.  This need not equal the number of working fireplaces in the dwelling.  This number excludes roof stacks built for bathroom venting, natural gas outlets, etc.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: BSMTGARAGE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Integral Basement Garage (Number of Cars)
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The number of vehicle spaces available in a garage that is basement level and comprises a portion of the main dwellingï¿½s basement.ï¿½ This does not include detached or attached above-grade garages.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: FINISHEDLIVINGAREA
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Total Square Feet of Living Area
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: Finished living area, as measured from the outside of the structure.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: CARDNUMBER
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Building (card) Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: For parcels having more than one building only one building is shown. This field contains the number of the building being shown (which is usually the main dwelling).

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: ALT_ID
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: Alternate Parcel Identification Number
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: In tax year 2007, parcel ID numbers within certain municipalities were converted to conform to  Allegheny County's standard naming convention for parcel ID's.   For affected parcels, this field shows the old parcel ID that was in use for tax years 2006 and prior.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: TAXYEAR
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: The current certified tax year
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The  applicable year for which real estate taxes would apply for the parcel.  Allegheny County currently assesses value based on how the parcel stood as of Jan 1 of that year.  This need not correspond to a calendar year.

518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.name: ASOFDATE
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.title: The run date of this file
518b583f-7cc8-4f60-94d0-174cc98310dc.description: The run date of this file.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: SCHOOLCODE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: School District Code
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: School district number associated with specified parcel.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: SCHOOLDESC
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: School District Name
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: School district name associated with specified parcel.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: MUNICODE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Municipality Code (Tax District)
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Municipality number associated with specified parcel.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: MUNIDESC
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Municipality Name
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Municipality name associated with specified parcel.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: RECORDDATE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Date Sale was Recorded
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Date the sale was recorded  in the Department of Real Estate. Format is mm/dd/yyyy.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: SALEDATE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Sale Date
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Date the sale occurred. Format is mm/dd/yyyy.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: PRICE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Sale Price
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Amount paid for the sale  (also called consideration).

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: DEEDBOOK
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Deed Book Number
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Cross-reference to the physical book number  where the deed is on file in the Department of Real Estate.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: DEEDPAGE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Page Number
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: Page within the specified deed book  corresponding to the first page of  this physical deed.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: SALECODE
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Sale Validation Code
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: A subjective categorization code denoting whether or not the sale price was representative of current market value. These categorizations are subject to change as sales are reviewed by the Office of Property Assessments or during a reassessment. See further explanation in the "Sale Validation Codes Details" resource.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: SALEDESC
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Sale Validation Code Description
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: A description of the code denoting whether or not the sale price was representative of current market value. These categorizations are subject to change as sales are reviewed by the Office of Property Assessments or during a reassessment. See further explanation in the "Sale Validation Codes Details" resource.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: INSTRTYP
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Instrument Type
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: A code describing the type of document used to record the real property transfer.

5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.name: INSTRTYPDESC
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.title: Instrument Description
5bbe6c55-bce6-4edb-9d04-68edeb6bf7b1.description: A description of the type of document used to record the real property transfer.

4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.name: INSPECTION_RESULT
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.title: Inspection Result
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.description: The result of the PLI inspection

4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.name: LOCATION
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.title: Location
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.description: Location of property of the violation

4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.name: COUNCIL_DISTRICT
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.title: Council District
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.description: City of Pittsburgh City Council district

4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.name: POLICE_ZONE
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.title: Police Zone
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.description: City of Pittsburgh City Police zone

4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.name: FIRE_ZONE
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.title: Fire Zone
4e5374be-1a88-47f7-afee-6a79317019b4.description: City of Pittsburgh City Fire zone
